title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Garfield Site Closed; Programs Cancelled Today August 10, 2016  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Garfield Site Closed; Programs Cancelled Today August 10, 2016  Due to a storm-related power outage, the James A. Garfield National Historic Site is CLOSED today. Consequently, the Civil War Photography Talk scheduled for Mentor Public Library at noon is cancelled. Please check back for a rescheduled date. more          Summer Hours Begin May 1  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Summer Hours Begin May 1  Summer hours have begun! Daily 10 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. - last tour of the day is at 4:15 p.m.
